content: Jade Essence is one of the Drinks you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Like the others, these provide different healing effects and boosts. The Jade Essence is one of the more basic upgrades, but a good one.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Jade_Essence.md', within the main section titled 'Jade Essence'.
The content is as follows:
Jade Essence is one of the Drinks you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Like the others, these provide different healing effects and boosts. The Jade Essence is one of the more basic upgrades, but a good one.
